mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from sys_menu
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (parent_id, name, path, component, order_num, is_frame, visible, status, perms, icon, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, deleted) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isFrame,jdbcType=BIT}, #{visible,jdbcType=BIT}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT})
